Great food, I loved the vegan options. They have quite a few vegan options, which is very exciting, as I usually find only one vegan dish at most places. The beer was good, I tried the Fort Apa. I had a Mexican vegan burger which was AMAZING, it was a black bean base with guac, caramelized onions, BBQ sauce and tomato/lettuce. It was so good. Served with like 5 sweet potato fries. The service was really great too. It would be nice if the portion sizes were a bit bigger, as the burger was slightly larger than a slider. But I guess it's in keeping with the tapas thing? After I left I wished I had ordered another one, as its more of a snack than a meal unless you get more than 1 thing. All in all it was a great time, they have wifi, beer and vegan food and that is all I ever want!
